title: Individualized Formative Assessment Feedback Process for Improving Pharmaceutical Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education utilizing standardized patient simulations and OSCE (Objective Structured Clinical Examination)

learning_goals: Learners improve communication skills by over 20% through standardized patient consultation simulations.
Learners achieve an average score of over 80% in clinical competency assessments.
Learners autonomously revise and enhance patient consultation scenarios based on individualized feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
